original_text:
“If thieves came to you,
    if robbers in the night—
oh, what a disaster awaits you!—
    would they not steal only as much as they wanted?
If grape pickers came to you,
    would they not leave a few grapes?
korean_text: 혹시 도둑이 네게 이르렀으며 강도가 밤중에 네게 이르렀을지라도 만족할 만큼 훔치면 그치지 아니하였겠느냐 혹시 포도를 따는 자가 네게 이르렀을지라도 그것을 얼마쯤 남기지 아니하였겠느냐 네가 어찌 그리 망하였는고

sentences.original_text: oh, what a disaster awaits you!—
sentences.korean_translation: 오, 어떤 재앙이 너를 기다리고 있는가!—

sentences.original_text: would they not steal only as much as they wanted?
If grape pickers came to you,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 포도 따는 사람들이 너에게 온다면,

sentences.original_text: would they not leave a few grapes?
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 몇 개의 포도를 남겨두지 않겠느냐?
